nodes.text: The Penumbra-1 shattersprite was a vessel that, according to legend, was used by the early Jedi. During the Bandit purges, Chelli Lona Aphra of the Accresker Penal Legion found the gundeck of a Penumbra-1 shattersprite aboard Accresker Jail, and believed that it might have been there for centuries and housed Force-sensitive relics.
